## Store.removeAllCookies() method

Removes all cookies from the store.

**Signature:**

```typescript
removeAllCookies(callback: ErrorCallback): void;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

callback


</td><td>

[ErrorCallback](./tough-cookie.errorcallback.md)


</td><td>

A function to call when all the cookies have been removed or an error occurs.

</tbody></table>

void
